alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Jones; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 7:34PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Jones, eastern Washington, eastern Craven, Hyde, Dare, eastern Beaufort, Tyrrell and Pamlico Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 734 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Scuppernong to near Catfish Lake. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, Stumpy Point, James City, Trent Woods, Belhaven, Killkenny, Manns Harbor, Swindell Fork, Alligator, Sladesville, Ransomville, Ponzer, Scranton, Gull Rock, Gum Neck, Kilkenny, Fairfield, Mashoes and Manteo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Jones; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; Tyrrell; Washington
